question: Which among the following details about the Global Talent Competitive Index 2019 are correct? 1.It is a biannual benchmarking report that measures the ability of countries to compete for talent. 2.It is released by INSEAD business school. 3.China emerged as the best performer among the BRICS countries, with an overall position of 45th. Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Global Talent Competitive Index is an annual benchmarking report that measures the ability of countries to compete for talent. The report measures levels of Global Talent Competitiveness by looking at 68 variables.
